# Bpmg AA SDK

> Typescript SDK for BPMG's Account Abstraction smart wallets and bundler integration.

## Docs

- [Get started](/bpmg-aa-sdk-docs/getting-started): Install the package.
- [precomputeSmartWallet](/bpmg-aa-sdk-docs/precomputeSmartWallet): Call `BpmgAccountFactory` smart contract method to calculate smart wallet contract address with `create2`.
The address is pre-deploy, which means no on-chain transaction.
